status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary:
Over this 6‑hour window the turbine remained in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with fairly steady production (power mean 0.1338, std 0.0514) under moderate winds (wind speed mean 5.61 m/s, std 0.64). Rotor and generator speeds were generally stable (rotor rpm std 0.495; generator rpm std 55.87) with a consistent average pitch of about -1.44 and mean temperature around 48.18.

Notable anomalies in the window-level stats include an extreme wind speed maximum of 36.9 relative to the mean, a persistent positive yaw misalignment average (~11.9), and a negative mean power residual (-0.0895), indicating production tended to be below the reference expectation on average.
